page.title: 01Gazetteer for Weaverthorpe
page.content: {Farms:}5 in the village, 6 outlying (The Doomsday Block also contains 2 farms belonging to adjacent parishes and excludes 2 farms in the parish) {Shops:}2 (1 also the Post Office) {Pubs :}2 (1 with a restaurant) {Village Hall}(meetings and surgery) {Factory} (Boythorpe Cropstores) {Builder and Joiner} (with 3 employees) {Coalman and coach hire}(with 3 part -time employees) {Garage} (car servicing, petrol and agricultural repairs) {Primary School} (40 pupils) {Chapel, Methodist} (newly rebuilt) {Telephone box, public} {"Over 60" Club} {"Ladies Guild" 1st Weaverthorpe{Brownie Pack} Tiny{village green}(former pond) {Norman Church and churchyard}just north of the D block
